name: MythoBattle: Dungeon Crawl
description:
I made a game for a school project and it is as far as it can be from what I had planned.

In this game you assume the role of a villages hero who has to clear out the dungeon from the great amount of monsters within.

For this specific version of the game it's just a dungeon crawler where you have to escape it by getting the key to the stairs. There are some already know issues that I'm going to change and/or improve, but for now I just wanted to publish this to see that I'm actually making progress for myself.
